task.title: Restrict Information in MyPack Portal
task.shortdesc: Follow these steps to restrict your directory information in MyPack Portal under FERPA regulations.

step.cmd: Log in to MyPack Portal and go to the Student Homepage.
From the left-hand menu, select "Privacy Restrictions".
Select the "Restrict" button for any info you want to restrict OR select the "Clear" button to remove a restriction.
If you want to enact a full privacy block, select "Full Privacy Block".
Click the "Save" button to save your changes.

note.p: Under FERPA, students have the right to restrict access to their directory information, including email, enrollment status, major, and more.
